scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run mkdir && npm run build:html && npm run build:css && npm run copy-dir
scripts.watch: npm run watch:html & npm run watch:css
scripts.copy-dir: cp -rf images build && cp -rf js build && cp -rf node_modules build && cp css/animate.css build/ && cp css/normalize.css build/
scripts.build:html: npm run clean:html && cp index.html build/
scripts.watch:html: npm run build:html && chokidar index.html -c 'npm run build:html'
scripts.build:css: npm run clean:css && lessc --source-map css/index.less build/style.css
scripts.watch:css: npm run build:css && chokidar 'css/**/*.less' -c 'npm run build:css'
